Room.Name: Nagaritha Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are wandering down Nagaritha Drive, north of a small shopping complex.
Room.LongDescription: The complex on the south provides much of the meat and grains to the community as well as other essentials to day-to-day survival. Directly to the south is the Downtown Ice and Water Supply Facility where, obviously, ice and water can be purchased for storage of meats and, of course, a nice cool glass of iced tea.
